page.title: 04Bus services-Llanhari area
page.content: The area surveyed is served by three bus services operated by National Welsh Bus Company.These services operate between Cardiff and the Rhondda Valleys,Pontypridd and Porthcawl and Talbot Green and Cowbridge. Together these provide a half hourly service in the Talbot Green and Pontyclun area,with an hourly service to Llanhari and Llanharan. A questionnaire survey was undertaken at Talbot Green Bus Station. Half of the people questioned thought that the bus service was adequate, but some thought that half an hour was to long to wait wait between each bus. A high percentage of those questioned thought that the bus fares were reasonably good value but some people thought that they were too high for old age pensioners.
